Please fill in your information to start using our services.

cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

PlateformAvailability: Your platform will be available on October 10th 2021
OurExpertise_Title1: A solution adapted to your budget
OurExpertise_Description1: In order to best meet your request, we ask service providers to adjust their prices by type of event.
OurExpertise_Description2: The registration of providers is closely observed by our teams in order to ensure optimal service.
OurExpertise_Description3: A rating system has been set up in order to be able to assess the reliability of each service provider.
About_Description1: The Christian community has many talents, but few are highlighted. On the one hand, we have people with excellent know-how who cannot find a platform on which to offer their services. And on the other, people who want to organize an event, but find themselves in difficulty when searching for providers. Thus, MGA is the answer to the needs of service providers and customers. Our goal is to support them in a relationship of trust.
About_Title2: More than a service, a relationship
About_Description2: With MGA you not only find a service provider but a real partner (singers, musicians, photographers ...) for the success of your events and your training. No need to go on different platforms. You’ll find everything you need on MGA! The platform offers both the possibility for providers to offer their services to a wide range of customers, and for the latter to have a carefully selected list of service providers.
About_CEO_Description:
Before being a company, MGA is a vision, which was born in the mind of its President Angel FABRIANO.

Angel is both a visionary and a leader, who believes that every Man has come upon the earth with a gift that he must manifest in order to impact his environment.

This is the cry of his heart, which he strives to express every day through his interactions with others and which he has decided to share with the world through MGA.

Through this platform, Ange wishes to highlight the talents of our community. Thus, MGA is the result of the meeting of talent and excellence.

« Let your light shine beyond the walls of the church, the world needs what you wear »

Angel FABRIANO
FAQ_Title: FAQ : Do you have any questions ? We have answers !
SearchBar_Title: Find the provider that's right for you.
My_Description_Placeholder: E.g: I was lulled by music, it is an integral part of my life. Singing with emotion and giving a taste for songs is what I do best. For me a successful performance is when the hall hums, sings and dances with me. During my free time, I give singing lessons at home or wherever I am.
